scripts.install:gm: brew install graphicsmagick || sudo apt-get install -y graphicsmagick || echo 'Please install GraphicsMagick manually'
scripts.install:exiftool: brew install exiftool || sudo apt-get install -y libimage-exiftool-perl || echo 'Please install ExifTool manually'
scripts.build: npm run install:gm && npm run install:exiftool && thumbsup --config config.json
